description: The Disable operation (POST only) disables login access for the user. It is only available to the administrator of the organization. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/Disable/02r30000026m000000/
title: disableUser

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

user.description: The username of the user to disable
